data.text: @MALaviolette I get it. But what do you want to do. It's the not-perfect world we live in. Don't be sad. Try to help change this world. Really.
@brendanshowbiz I know... but it's sad that this song has to exist.

@MALaviolette Not sad, angry. With good reason. "I wanna walk through the park in the dark/Men are scared that women will laugh at them/I wanna walk through the park in the dark/Women are scared that men will kill them." Great lyrics.
@brendanshowbiz Sad song though when you think about it. #strangetimes
